long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing AliSave – Your Essential Tool for Effortless Image and Video Downloads on AliExpress!

🌟 Must-Have for Dropshipping Business
Enhance your dropshipping experience with AliSave – a free Chrome extension designed to simplify image and video saving from AliExpress.

🚀 Getting Started

1. Install the extension with a click on "Add to Chrome."
2. Navigate to an AliExpress product page.
3. Seamlessly download by clicking on the intuitive buttons.

🎨 Features for Ultimate Convenience

- Download main product images, variation images, and description pictures.
- Ensure top-quality image downloads.
- Convert webp images to JPG effortlessly.
- Remove image metadata for a clean download.
- Save product videos directly.
- Access HTML product descriptions.
- Download a handy text file with comprehensive product information.
- Compatible with aliexpress.com, aliexpress.ru, and Alibaba.

🔥 Hot Features to Ignite Your Experience

- Download images as a convenient .ZIP file.
- Explore similar products using image search on AliExpress.
- Effortlessly download images one by one with a simple right-click.
- Add a watermark automatically to downloaded images.
- Optimize image sizes with the best quality and compression.
- Gain access to real product photos from customer feedback and reviews.

🌐 Universal Support

Enjoy AliSave's full range of features across AliExpress, Alibaba, aliexpress.com, and aliexpress.ru.

🔒 Privacy Protection is a Priority

For any privacy concerns, reach out to us via email. AliSave is committed to maintaining Chrome Web Store's privacy policy.

🆓 Try AliSave for now!

Don't miss out on this opportunity – AliSave is easy to use. Enhance your dropshipping journey with the ultimate image and video saving solution!
